name: Jigsaw Realm 3D
description:
Jigsaw Realm 3D is a puzzle for relaxation, assemble the puzzle in a cozy room, under the purring of a cat, the sounds of a fireplace and pleasant music in the background.
In Jigsaw Realm 3D there is no donation and microtransactions, choose what you like and start the game.

- 72 unique images.
- 9 categories ( Fantasy, Art, Water, Architecture, Waterfalls, Nature, Animals, Flowers, Food.)
- Full 3D.
- 4 difficulties.
- Hints.
- More than 40 pleasant musical compositions.
- Convenient player with a choice of music.
- Built-In Radio.
- Nice modern graphics with a warm atmosphere.
- Smart save system, for each picture. (The build will continue where you left off last time.)

Jigsaw Realm 3D is developed by one person, and the income from the game and future DLCs will go to the development of story driven Jigsaw Realm 3D, on the theme of vampires. In it you will find a full-fledged plot and a story that will open after assembling various locations of the game world. The game is sure to please every fan of such puzzles.
